description:
One particular CBS show has defied the odds from being canceled. Unfortunately, it’s finally coming to an end after several years on the air. On the bright side, there is an official ending. Many shows, especially these days with so many streaming services, find themselves being prematurely cancelled. This particular show moved from CBS to [...]

title: Fan-Favorite CBS Show Ending After 4 Seasons

description:

title: Iconic Horror Franchise Reportedly Getting New Movie
